definition: A term commonly employed to express a sense of indifference or nonchalance towards a particular matter or situation. It is often used to convey a lack of concern or importance placed on something, suggesting that it doesn't matter or is of little significance.

examples.german: Mir ist es egal, ob du kommst oder nicht.
examples.english: I don't care if you come or not.

examples.german: Es ist mir egal, was andere denken.
examples.english: I don't care what others think.

examples.german: Egal, wie viel es kostet, ich kaufe es.
examples.english: No matter how much it costs, I'll buy it.

examples.german: Egal, ob du gewinnst oder verlierst, du musst es versuchen.
examples.english: Whether you win or lose, you have to try.
